scripts.build-worker: browserify src/worker.js -t [ babelify ] | uglifyjs -m -c drop_console=true > src/worker-temp.js
scripts.build-main-dev: browserify src/main.js -t [ babelify ] -t workerify -s Port > dist/port.js
scripts.build-main: browserify src/main.js -t [ babelify ] -t workerify -s Port | uglifyjs -m -c drop_console=true > dist/port.js
scripts.build-dev: npm run build-worker-dev && npm run build-main-dev
scripts.build: npm run build-worker && npm run build-main && rm src/worker-temp.js
scripts.watch: nodemon --watch src --ignore worker-temp.js --ext vue,js,css,html --exec 'npm run build-dev'
